resources.string:
We can use String values for large chunks of content! You can trust me on that... I am the Professor. This is just ONE TEXT VIEW! And just ONE String!!!

To import image resources into your project, do the following: 

Drag and drop your images directly onto the Resource Manager window in Android Studio. *(The Resource Manager window is the tab right under the Project tab where the hierarchy is shown) 

Alternatively, you can click the plus icon (+), choose Import Drawables, and then select the files and folders that you want to import.
